r.d: This is a Renderer driver for Structures_DataGrid using HTML_Template_Flexy. It adds a couple of variables to a Flexy instance and adds paging functionality. This renderer also enables customised result messages, customised column labels and a column label formatter.
r.n: - Bug #11332: Fixed getPaging method with required build method for Structures_DataGrid_Renderer_Pager - Bug #11333: Fixed possible package xml problem with installation.
